td.content: s:patient presents with 5 months history of moderate yellowing of the eye, mild abdominal pain and mild nausea. patient is a 58 YO white f. o:Height 67 in, Weight 140 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, and ordered CT Abdomen.

s:pt presents with progressive severe diarrhea, severe pain all over the abdomen and mild nausea for past 11 days. she is a white F aged 59 yrs. o:Height 67 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg IV, mitomycin - 10 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, Amylase, Lipase, CA 19-9.
